channel.title: The Future in Tech - Updated
channel.subtitle: Powered by LinkedIn Learning
channel.itunes:author: Ray Villalobos
channel.description: Conversations with leaders building next generation techology tools.

item.description: Ray Villalobos and Content Managers Natalie Pao and Simon St. Laurent discuss what 2023 holds for the future in technology.
item.itunes:author: Ray Villalobos

item.description: Pinar Demirdag discusses the fundamentals of generative AI, its practical applications, and future developments as companies create AI strategies in 2023.
item.itunes:author: Ray Villalobos

item.description: Jerome Hardaway explores how generative AI can revolutionize the software development process by increasing efficiency, automating repetitive tasks, and creating more sophisticated and innovative solutions.
item.itunes:author: Ray Villalobos

item.description: Ayodele Odubela, a Data Scientist, Machine Learning professional and AI Entrepreneur, discusses the ethical issues surrounding the rapid adoption of AI systems, including transparency, minimizing bias, ensuring fairness, and potential ramifications around privacy, security, and governance.
item.itunes:author: Ray Villalobos

item.description: Andreas Welsch joins this discussion to share insights on crafting an AI strategy for businesses that considers evolving technology, ethics, and legal implications, drawing from his extensive experience in managing stakeholder relationships and leading AI projects across Fortune 500 companies.
item.itunes:author: Ray Villalobos
